price: 25. Waxaa beeniyey (Xaqa) kuwii ka horreeyey (gaaladan), wuxuuna uga yimid cadaabku meelo aysan dreemeyn.
arabic: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim fa-atāhumu al-ʿadhābu min ḥaythu lā yashʿurūna
